Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT IMP_SEGURADA_IX, PRM_TARIFARIO_IX, cod_opcaopciocc
FROM seguros.v1bilhete_cober
 
WHERE
    cod_empresa   =   :COD_EMPRESA
and ramofr        =   :RAMOFR
and modalifr      =   :MODALIFR
and vlprmtot   between :CB62W001.W01P1503 and :CB62W001.W02P1503
and dtinivig     <=   :DTINIVIG
and dttervig     >=   :DTINIVIG
and ide_cobertura =   '1'
/
 END SQL
